title: Gather 'Round and Hear the Preacher
description:
This Washington D.C. Preacher is taking the Lord's word into his own hands and telling the laaaaaaddieesss how it is.

Stream "The Bonfire with Big Jay Oakerson & Dan Soder" for 3 months free on the SiruisXM app! Offer Details Apply: www.SiriusXM.com/Bonfire
